body:
Try changing line 74 in epw2wea.c from:


	fprintf(WEA_FILE,"time_zone %.0f\n",-15.0*atoi(time_zone)); 


to:
	fprintf(WEA_FILE,"time_zone %.0f\n",-15.0*atof(time_zone)); 


Does this fix the problem?


-Greg
___
